<file path="source.rs">

struct SourceFile {
    pub path: String,
}

trait Summarizable {
}

impl SourceFile {

    fn new(path: String, content: String) -> Self

    fn line_count(&self) -> u32
}

impl Summarizable for SourceFile {
}

trait FileOperations {
}

enum FileError {
    NotFound,
    PermissionDenied,
    InvalidContent,
}

impl FileOperations for SourceFile {
}
</file>
